H0.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. Atlantic Records

H1.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. EMI Records

H2.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. Warner Bros. Records

H3.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. The Pond

A4.text: Collins was signed to Virgin in the UK as a solo act.

A5.text: Genesis' contract with Atlantic was up for renewal, and Collins was yet to sign as a solo artist.

A6.text: On 29 March 1996, Collins's decision to leave Genesis to concentrate on his solo career was publicly announced.

A7.text: In the months surrounding his departure from Genesis, Collins formed the Phil Collins Big Band, seating himself on the drums.
